reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does declare the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the collection of data, including personal data, for various purposes.
reply.reference: We collect user’s personal data when user starts using our Services. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Device Info, Identity Data, Payment and banking information, Usage Data, Cookies, unique device identifiers for advertising, and other various types of Data as specified in the privacy policy of the services used by the app.

content: various types of Data specified in service privacy policies

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the specific types of data mentioned in the privacy policy document that the app collects.
reply.reference: The app collects Device Info, Identity Data, Payment and banking information, Usage Data, Cookies, unique device identifiers for advertising, and various types of Data as specified in the privacy policy of the service. URL: https://gototop.b-cdn.net/Gototop%20Privacy%20Policy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use in the Privacy Policy document.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy document clearly outlines the purposes for which data is collected and used, including account setup, customer support, training, identity verification, providing information, customization, technical issue resolution, communication, feedback provision, billing, and administrative purposes.
reply.reference: We collect Registration Data if you wish to register for the Services (to create an account) – only if it is applicable to the App, a device to set up and administer your account, provide technical and customer support and training, verify your identity, and send important account, subscription, and Service information. | Contract (art. 6(1)(b) of the GDPR) | We collect almost all data to provide and deliver the Services and all features, to show information about the app and your progress, to customize your experience, to enable your access, and to address technical issues. | Contract (art. 6(1)(b) of the GDPR) or Contract (art. 6(1)(b) of the GDPR) if the data relates to a special category of personal data in a covered jurisdiction. | To communicate with us (for example: to answer your questions and requests) To provide you with feedback and information about your progress. | Legitimate interest ((art. 6(1)(f) of GDPR) | For billing (invoicing), account management, and other administrative purposes, if applicable | Contract (art. 6(1)(b) of the GDPR) | The purpose of this Privacy Policy is the fulfillment of the provisions of the Terms of Service (“Contract”) concluded between the User and GOTOTOP LTD. We collect user’s personal data when user starts using our Services. Our main aim is to perform our contractual obligation towards the User and make our Service available to the User. We use information that you submit and information that is processed automatically to provide you with all requested services. | URL: https://gototop.b-cdn.net/Gototop%20Privacy%20Policy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the User has the right to 'opt-out' or direct the app to stop 'selling' or sharing user information with third parties. The document also mentions the right to request the deletion of information collected from users.
reply.reference: The User has the right to 'opt-out' or direct us to stop 'selling' or otherwise sharing your information with third parties in exchange for monetary or other valuable consideration. To submit an opt-out request, please follow the instructions. URL: https://gototop.b-cdn.net/Gototop%20Privacy%20Policy.html.

source_documents.excerpt:
described above by emailing us at gototop@support-team.app. We must confirm your identity (e.g., first name, last name, account name, email address, state of residence, Etc.) and California residency to process your requests to exercise your information, access, or deletion rights. We aim to respond to a consumer request for access or deletion within 45 days of receiving that request. We will inform you of the reason and extension period in writing if we require more time.

the privacy settings on your device settings menu. Please note that even if you use your right to opt-out, you will still receive advertising, but not direct or target interest. On Apple, you can opt out of this by going to Settings > Privacy > Advertising and turning on “Limit Ad Tracking”. On Android, you can opt-out by going to Settings > Google Services> Ads and choosing “Opt out of Ads Personalization.”

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as part of its operation to provide personalized, relevant advertisements within the service.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app shares Personal Data with certain third parties to deliver personalized advertisements within the service.
reply.reference: We share your Personal Data with certain third parties as part of our operation of the Service, whether shared by us or gathered directly by third parties through SDKs integrated into the Service. This data sharing enables us to provide you with the Service in an optimal way, such as serving you personalized, relevant advertisements within the Service. URL: https://gototop.b-cdn.net/Gototop%20Privacy%20Policy.html

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with HelpDesk (Text, Inc.) and AppLovin Corp.
